ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:28}); // {Cloud}
“I don't understand what you're saying!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:41}); // {Cloud}
“Ha ha ha…
Black Materia”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:45}); // {Cloud}
“Looks like we're locked in.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:2}); // {Aeris}
“Wait!
Look! It's showing us!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:22}); // {Aeris}
“This is the room with the murals…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:42}); // {Aeris}
“{Cloud}!!
“{Cloud}!!
Get a hold of yourself!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:39}); // {Cid}
“What the hell is going on?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:37}); // {Yuffie}
“{Cloud}!
What are you doing?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:38}); // “{Cloud}!
What's going on with you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // Tseng
“…I wonder.
Anyway, we have to report to the President.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:7}); // Tseng
“Yeah…”{PAUSE}“Hey Elena, how 'bout dinner after
this job's over?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:9}); // Tseng
“Is this the Promised Land?
No, it can't be…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:12}); // Tseng
“This place…what is it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:15}); // Tseng
“One with the Planet?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:19}); // Tseng
“…You can do that?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:4}); // Elena
“Tseng, what's this?
Can we find the Promised Land with this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:8}); // Elena
“Th…Thank you very much.”{PAUSE}“If I may be excused…”
fadeScreen({r:11, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:2}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:11, g:64, b:32, speed:64, type:16}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:11, g:255, b:32, speed:64, type:30}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // Sephiroth
“You stupid fools.
You have never even thought about it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // Sephiroth
“All the spirit energy of this Planet.
All its wisdom…knowledge…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // “I will meld with it all.
I will become one with it…
it will become one with me.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // Sephiroth
“Only death awaits you all.
But do not fear.”{PAUSE}“For it is through death that
a new spirit energy is born.
Soon, you will live again as a part of me.”
fadeScreen({r:11, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:2}); // unused=0

dialogStrings:
Elena
“Tseng, what's this?
Can we find the Promised Land with this?”

Tseng
“…I wonder.
Anyway, we have to report to the President.”

Tseng
“Yeah…”{PAUSE}“Hey Elena, how 'bout dinner after
this job's over?”

Elena
“Th…Thank you very much.”{PAUSE}“If I may be excused…”

Tseng
“Is this the Promised Land?
No, it can't be…”

Sephiroth
“So you opened the door.
Well done.”

Sephiroth
“A lost treasure house of knowledge.
The wisdom of the Ancients….”

Sephiroth
“I am becoming one with the Planet.”

Sephiroth
“You stupid fools.
You have never even thought about it.”

Sephiroth
“All the spirit energy of this Planet.
All its wisdom…knowledge…”

“I will meld with it all.
I will become one with it…
it will become one with me.”

Sephiroth
“Only death awaits you all.
But do not fear.”{PAUSE}“For it is through death that
a new spirit energy is born.
Soon, you will live again as a part of me.”

{Aeris}
“This is the room with the murals…”

Sephiroth
“So cold.”{PAUSE}“I am always by your side.”

Sephiroth
“At that which adds to the knowledge
of…”
